creditline: Collection of Roger Arvid Anderson in Honor of John Austin O'Keeffe
description: Plaque with right profile of Sarah Redwood Lee; plumes and coat of arms at bottom; inscription at top
text: Saint Gaudens made several portrait reliefs that included Sarah Lee (born 1865), one of five children of Dr. Charles C. and Helen Lee.  A decorative band at the bottom of the plaque consists of plumes and a simplified coat-of-arms, which bears some resemblance to the coat-of-arms of General Robert E. Lee, to whom Sarah's family was distantly related.
title: Sarah Redwood Lee
